name: NewsCred
description: NewsCred, Inc. is a content marketing and syndication platform, providing access to license text, images, and video from leading publications. The NewsCred API provides access to news articles, with grouping by stories, topics, categories, sources, and author. Contact NewsCred for pricing, and access to content via API.
